name: ZenBook Pro Duo
details: A powerful laptop with a dual-screen setup, perfect for multitasking professionals and creators. Features an Intel Core i9 processor and NVIDIA RTX graphics.

name: Galaxy S24 Ultra
details: The ultimate smartphone experience with a pro-grade camera, stunning display, and an integrated S Pen for productivity on the go.

name: WH-1000XM5 Headphones
details: Industry-leading noise-canceling headphones with exceptional sound quality and a comfortable, lightweight design for all-day listening.

name: 4K OLED Smart TV
details: Experience perfect blacks and infinite contrast with this 65-inch OLED TV. Smart features and a cinematic sound system bring entertainment to life.

name: Classic Leather Watch
details: A timeless timepiece with a genuine leather strap and a minimalist dial. Perfect for both formal and casual occasions.

name: Smart Coffee Maker
details: Brew the perfect cup of coffee from your phone. This smart maker allows you to schedule brews, adjust strength, and more.

name: MacBook Air M3
details: Supercharged by the M3 chip, the MacBook Air is incredibly thin and fast, with a stunning Liquid Retina display and all-day battery life.

name: Pixel 8 Pro
details: The smartest Google phone yet, with an amazing camera powered by AI, a brilliant display, and a powerful Tensor G3 chip.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
details: Stay comfortable and productive with this fully adjustable ergonomic chair, featuring lumbar support and a breathable mesh back.

name: Wireless Mechanical Keyboard
details: A compact 75% layout mechanical keyboard with satisfying tactile switches, RGB backlighting, and dual-mode connectivity (Bluetooth/Wired).

name: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
details: Smart cleaning with LiDAR navigation and powerful suction. Control and schedule cleanings from anywhere with the mobile app.

name: Air Purifier
details: Breathe cleaner air with a True HEPA filter that captures 99.97% of airborne particles, including dust, pollen, and smoke.

name: Fitness Tracker
details: Track your steps, heart rate, sleep patterns, and workouts with this sleek and water-resistant fitness tracker.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
details: Enjoy rich, powerful sound on the go. This speaker is waterproof, dustproof, and has a 12-hour battery life.

name: Gaming Mouse

name: Digital Drawing Tablet

name: Air Fryer

name: E-Reader
